mapper.insert: insert into FRREVIEW (FRANREVIEW_NO, FRANREVIEW_SJ, FRANREVIEW_CN, FRANREVIEW_DE, FRANREVIEW_IMAGE, FRANREVIEW_SE, FRANREVIEW_BLIND_AT, FRANREVIEW_SCORE, FSM_DTLS_NO, FRANREVIEW_WRITER) values (#{franreviewNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{franreviewSj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{franreviewCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{franreviewDe,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{franreviewImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{franreviewSe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{franreviewBlindAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{franreviewScore,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{fsmDtlsNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{franreviewWriter,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update FRREVIEW set FRANREVIEW_SJ = #{franreviewSj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRANREVIEW_CN = #{franreviewCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRANREVIEW_DE = #{franreviewDe,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FRANREVIEW_IMAGE = #{franreviewImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRANREVIEW_SE = #{franreviewSe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRANREVIEW_BLIND_AT = #{franreviewBlindAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRANREVIEW_SCORE = #{franreviewScore,jdbcType=FLOAT}, FSM_DTLS_NO = #{fsmDtlsNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRANREVIEW_WRITER = #{franreviewWriter,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where FRANREVIEW_NO = #{franreviewNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select FRANREVIEW_NO, FRANREVIEW_SJ, FRANREVIEW_CN, FRANREVIEW_DE, FRANREVIEW_IMAGE, FRANREVIEW_SE, FRANREVIEW_BLIND_AT, FRANREVIEW_SCORE, FSM_DTLS_NO, FRANREVIEW_WRITER from FRREVIEW where FRANREVIEW_NO = #{franreviewNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select FRANREVIEW_NO, FRANREVIEW_SJ, FRANREVIEW_CN, FRANREVIEW_DE, FRANREVIEW_IMAGE, FRANREVIEW_SE, FRANREVIEW_BLIND_AT, FRANREVIEW_SCORE, FSM_DTLS_NO, FRANREVIEW_WRITER from FRREVIEW
